item.title: Customize Machine and On-demand Network Names
item.author: Author
item.description: Credit: Huge thanks to my colleague, Michael Patton, for working with me on this demo. vRA 8 blueprint gives random names and numbers to the VMs and on-demand NSX-T networks deployed if you do not specify a naming convention. This blog will cover how you can customize the names of your VMs and on-demand NSX-T networks when they are deployed from a vRA 8 blueprint. Prerequisites vRA 8: NSX-T account connected Basic infrastructure configured (Projects, Cloud Zones, Flavor Mappings, Image Mappings) NSX-T (if you want to use on-demand network name):
